verses.verse: And if <S%H518><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offering, <S%H8002><s%> if <S%H518><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> offer <S%H7126><s%> it of <S%H4480><s%> the herd; <S%H1241><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> it be a male <S%H2145><s%> or <S%H518><s%> female, <S%H5347><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it without blemish <S%H8549><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his offering, <S%H7133><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> it at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offering <S%H8002><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%>

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on <S%H5921><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the flanks, <S%H3689><s%> and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the liver, <S%H3516><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> it shall he take away. <S%H5493><s%>

And Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar <S%H4196><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the burnt sacrifice, <S%H5930><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on <S%H5921><s%> the fire: <S%H784><s%> it is an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offering <S%H8002><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be of <S%H4480><s%> the flock; <S%H6629><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> or <S%H176><s%> female, <S%H5347><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it without blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> offer <S%H7126><s%> a lamb <S%H3775><s%> <S%H853><s%> for his offering, <S%H7133><s%> then shall he offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his offering, <S%H7133><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offering <S%H8002><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof, and the whole <S%H8549><s%> rump, <S%H451><s%> it shall he take off <S%H5493><s%> hard by <S%H5980><s%> the backbone; <S%H6096><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%>

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the flanks, <S%H3689><s%> and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the liver, <S%H3516><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> it shall he take away. <S%H5493><s%>
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> it is the food <S%H3899><s%> of the offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> be a goat, <S%H5795><s%> then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of it, and kill <S%H7819><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> thereof <S%H4480><s%> his offering, <S%H7133><s%> even an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%>

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the flanks, <S%H3689><s%> and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the liver, <S%H3516><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> it shall he take away. <S%H5493><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> it is the food <S%H3899><s%> of the offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor: <S%H7381><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> is the LORD's. <S%H3068><s%>

It shall be a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute <S%H2708><s%> for your generations <S%H1755><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> your dwellings, <S%H4186><s%> that ye eat <S%H398><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> fat <S%H2459><s%> nor blood. <S%H1818><s%>
